patterns.title: Knots of Love NICU Blankie Pattern
patterns.materials: Any Soft Yarn: weight does not matter, Size 9 Needles: circular or straight

patterns.title: Preemie Crochet Octopus
patterns.materials: Medium 4 Yarn, Size G/6 (4mm) Crochet Hook, Black Embroirdery Floss, Embroirdery Needle

patterns.title: Snuggle Cuddle Cocoon Crochet Pattern
patterns.materials: Light 3 Yarn, Size G/6 (4mm) Crochet Hook, 3 Buttons

patterns.title: Crochet Ventilator Bonnet
patterns.materials: Medium 4 Yarn, Size 11 (3mm) Crochet Hook, Size 2.5mm Crochet Hook

patterns.title: NICU Smock Pattern
patterns.materials: Cotton Flannel, Thread that is approriate for cloth, Basic Sewing Supplies or Machine, Velcro that can be sewn on or Plastic Snaps (please do not use any form of a metal fastener), NOTE: 1/3 yard needed for a single layer smock, a reversable smock will need 2/3 yard
